title: Moving AI governance forward
summary: OpenAI and other leading AI labs are making voluntary commitments to enhance the safety, security, and trustworthiness of AI technology. These commitments include internal and external red-teaming of models, information sharing among companies and governments, investment in cybersecurity, incentivizing the discovery of vulnerabilities, developing mechanisms to identify AI-generated content, publicly reporting model capabilities and limitations, prioritizing research on societal risks, and deploying AI systems to address societal challenges. These commitments aim to advance AI governance and promote responsible AI development and use.
